column5: Our place is right on the water at Lake Conroe.  15 minutes north of The Woodlands.  45 minutes from Bush Intercontinental Airport, (IAH). An hour north of Houston City Center with all it's attractions.  An hour and 15 minutes from NASA Space Center.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Shaded Private Balcony on the Water (1)
